section.question: What if my diagnosis in the app is far from the real diagnosis
section.answer: We offer you the right to rate your diagnosis in the archive section, this helps us improve our model and insure a better experience for our users.

section.question: How does the diagnosis work?
section.answer: The application makes it really easy for you to get your diagnosis, navigate to the diagnosis part in the navigation bar and choose diagnosis, then you choose between taking a picture or browsing in the gallery once the picture is uploaded you get you diagnosis.

section.question: What's the accuracy of the prediction?
section.answer: Our tensorflow lite model is well trained using the teachablemachine website, but not to worry the accuracy of the model is available at every diagnosis.
